Reviews.Content: loved somerset somerset has one bedrm apts ,new furniture, clean-spotless. good location on park, cafes everywhere, walk everywhere; train and bus outside door. less than 200 dollars in expensive sydney. we highly recommend this place; even has washer /dryer/full kitchen. nice indoor pool. for more money the chain hotels provide just a room. helpful staff. just great place.
Reviews.Author: kennym66
